description: The `Subheader` component is generally used inside of lists or menus.

style.description: An optional style to apply to the subheader.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the subheader.

primary.description: Boolean if the subheader should be styled with the primary color.

inset.description:
Boolean if the subheader is inset in the list. This will add additional
spacing to align the subheader.

primaryText.description: The primary text to use in the subheader.

children.description:
Any optional children to display after the `primaryText`. This prop is
unrecommended.

component.description: The component to render the Subheader as.
